format: html

```{r}
#| label: setup

library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
data(gapminder)

```

```{r}
#| label: fig-plot

gapminder <- gapminder

gapminder %>%
  filter(continent == "Europe") %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = gdpPercap) +
           geom_point() +
           geom_smooth()
         )
  
  
```
